name: BlockJack
description: BlockJack introduces the most accessible, user-friendly, and secure BlackJack experience, powered by Ethereum, right from the popular Telegram app! Fund your game wallet without giving up any keys, connect to the BlockJack Telegram app, and may the odds be in your favor! Supported by cryptographic pseudo-randomness, with all game transactions anonymized and shared publicly, BlockJack is fair, safe, and simple.
